item.title: Create Barcode With Excel and Dymo Label Maker Software
item.description: For our environment we needed a inexpensive way to print barcodes, that was not tied to unique licensed software. our current barcodes are using code 39 format. what we decided to try to use a Dymo Label Printer LabelWriter 450 Direct Thermal Label Printer And we fond labels that where not far off from our current size. DYMO LW Multi-Purpose Labels for LabelWriter Label Printers, White, 1'' x 2-1/8'', 1 roll of 500 (30336)
